title: Strengthening Practical Competencies in HR Management: Tool Utilization Strategies in Computer-Based Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and advanced expertise in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can solve specialized field problems 30% more efficiently using computer-based tools
Learners can apply personalized advice provided during tool usage with over 80% accuracy
Learners can reflectively evaluate tool selection and usage processes at least twice using metacognitive strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
